messages.content:
____
| G C | 
| > B |
-------

Where should the arrow turn to look directly at G? Left, right, or none?
The arrow should turn to the left to look directly at G.

____
| G C | 
| > B |
|A K |
-------

Where should the arrow turn to look directly at B? Left, right, or none?
The arrow should turn to the right to look directly at B.
